messages.subject: Saigo Takamori and Seikanron
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all. I m going on writing my graduation thesis on Saigou Takamori and the Seikanron. Now I m translating some of Saigou s letters from the Saigou Takamori
messages.messageBody:
Hi all.
I'm going on writing my graduation thesis on Saigou Takamori and the
Seikanron.
Now I'm translating some of Saigou's letters from the Saigou Takamori
Zenshuu, dated from 1873/7/29 to 1876/10/8, the crucial point in the
"Occupy Korea debate".
Do you know any essay (better if online) on this argument?
Thank you.

Domenico
